attributes.action: Creation of a Firework use Licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow the sale of fireworks to only thoes over 18 holding a Fireworks use licenced. The licence should be obtained from local firestations after initial training session is completed. The training session should be paid for by the applicant this would make use of slow periods at the firestations in question. Shop owners should then only be allowed to sell to people holding the licence.
